fields.value: Ahem. Let's start with Fantasy. On the other hand: right now I'm writing a reading journal on Kants Critique of pure reason (in German). You can find it here: https://paper.wf/atheinschi/

fields.name: Other
fields.value: I play guitar with great passion, little talent and less skill. I love my dog, a little poodle lady. Recently I am also into Tai Chi and Qi-Gong.
